alert.note: Alert for Dawson; McCone; Prairie (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 12:45AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern McCone, north central Prairie and west central Dawson Counties through 115 AM MDT... At 1245 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southeast of Brockway, or 20 miles south of Circle, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lindsay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM MDT for northeastern Montana.
